Title: Relates to the duty of a vehicular assailant to support a surviving child
Summary: Imposes a duty on a vehicular assailant to support a surviving child of a parent or guardian killed by such person; defines income; provides for a determination of support.
LawCode: Add ยง419, amd ยง413-a, Fam Ct Act; amd ยง111-n, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the family court act and the social services law, in relation to a vehicular assailant's duty to support a surviving child
